scripts.allure-report: yarn allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.smoke: cross-env cucumber-js --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.steps.ts --require-module ts-node/register features/**/*.feature --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter -t @smoke --retry 1 -t @smoke
scripts.regression: cross-env cucumber-js --require support/hooks.ts --require steps/**/*.steps.ts --require-module ts-node/register features/**/*.feature --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --retry 1 -t @regression
